name: Callipo's Invasion
description:
Warning: This game is a WIP! 

Callipo, your cute little alien budy, is on his way to take control of his first ship ever! Help him take control over it, and, maybe later, of the world! 

A hypercasual one button platformer, made by four games master students of University of Applied Sciences Hamburg. It's still a work in progress, though any feedback is welcome :) 

Features: 

-Be a mischievous little guy!

-Run through a spaceship!

-Dodge obstacles! 

-Flip gravity and even walk on the ceiling!

Credits:

-Jana: Background Art, Sound, Leveldesign

-Moritz: Character Art/Animation, Obstacles, Background Art

-Lynn @red-meeple: UI Design, Programming

-Jacob: Programming

-Noa: Intro Animation, Icons, Obstacles
